name: Trigger Jenkins on New Tag
on:
  push:
    tags:
      - 'v*'  # Trigger only for tags starting with 'v' (e.g., v1.0.0)

jobs:
  trigger_jenkins:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Trigger Jenkins Build
        run: |
          CRUMB=$(curl -s -u "${{ secrets.JENKINS_USER }}:${{ secrets.JENKINS_TOKEN }}" \
          "${{ secrets.JENKINS_URL }}/crumbIssuer/api/xml?xpath=concat(//crumbRequestField,\":\",//crumb)")
          curl -X POST \
            -u "${{ secrets.JENKINS_USER }}:${{ secrets.JENKINS_TOKEN }}" \
            -H "$CRUMB" \
            "${{ secrets.JENKINS_URL }}/job/vc-git-poc/build"
